title: Falling for You
overview: Su Shengnan is a shrewd and capable producer who has a disdain for brainless romance dramas. However, in an unexpected twist of fate, she ends up crossing over into a romance drama, becoming the female protagonist, Su Su, and the object of pursuit for the male lead, Ouyang Yuchuan. The character of Su Su was originally gentle and kind, a role which disdained by Su Shengnan. As a result, Shengnan decided to change the character's image and sculpted Su Su into a powerful, strong woman. Ouyang Yuchuan is a wealthy and domineering CEO who initially earned Su Shengnan's disapproval. However, as they spent time living together, Su Shengnan gradually uncovered the kindness and sense of responsibility hidden beneath Ouyang Yuchuan's stern exterior. Meanwhile, Ouyang Yuchuan grew increasingly captivated by Shengnan's strong, independent nature. After going through numerous tribulations, Su Shengnan and Ouyang Yuchuan ultimately acknowledge their feelings for each other. They love and respect each other, crafting a timeless, romantic relationship.
